Pyongyang Cultural Exchange Centre established in Guyana
articles.content:
Pyongyang Cultural Exchange Centre established in Guyana 
    Pyongyang, September 6 (KCNA) -- The Pyongyang Center for Cultural Exchange was established in Georgetown, Guyana, on the occasion of the 53rd anniversary of the DPRK.
 The center will hold DPRK book, photo and handicraft exhibitions, film and music shows, lecture session, seminar, etc. to introduce the wise leadership of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and the Korean people's struggle to build a powerful nation and achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of the country among the Guyanese people.    
 The inaugural ceremony held on August 29 elected chief of the center.

Greetings to President of Brazil
articles.content:
Greetings to President of Brazil 
    Pyongyang, September 6 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, President of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, on September 4 sent a message of greetings to Fernando Henrique Cardoso, President of Brazil, on the occasion of its independence day.
 The message sent warm congratulations to him and the people of brazil on its independence day.    
 Believing that the friendly relations between the two countries would further develop in the idea of independence, peace and friendship, it wished him greater success in his responsible work for the prosperity of the country.

Telephone message to chief delegate of S. Korea
articles.content:
Telephone message to chief delegate of S. Korea 
    Pyongyang, September 6 (KCNA) -- The head of the delegation of the north side to the inter-Korean ministerial talks sent a telephone message to the chief delegate of the south side.
 He in the message welcomed the south side's positive response to the north side's constructive proposal to resume the talks between the authorities of the north and south.    
 Agreeing to the south side's proposal to hold the 5th inter-Korean ministerial talks side would render positive cooperation in making the talks successfully proceed in the spirit of the June 15 joint declaration amidst the nation's expectation and concern.
